txt.en: Poisoned critters can be found in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should cure the poisoned critters.
Cured poisoned critters in the Wildwood.
Cure poisoned critters in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Cured poisoned critters in the Wildwood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Someone has posted a task to heal critters who have been poisoned by careless Tarkrîp Orcs.

You have successfully cured many of the poisoned critters found in the Wildwood. Your efforts to keep watch over the unspoiled beauty of the Wildwood will not go unnoticed by the Free Peoples at Trader's Wharf and Trestlebridge. You will certainly be rewarded for all that you have accomplished.

The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Urgent: Small critters in the Wildwood are being poisoned by the Tarkrîp Orcs! Please search the woods for these poisoned animals and cure them. We can not have these animals infecting larger game or being caught and eaten by us! You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
